title: Happy youth in sun and snow: winter holidays in Switzerland
brief_description: This film describes the facilities for children to learn winter sports under expert guidance. Skating, ice hockey, toboganning are shown, and training in skiing from the nursery slopes to racing is seen in some detail. No commentary, music soundtrack only.
